General.Name: SFI PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company SFI, an investment holding company, primarily operates as a leasing company in Russia. The company leases vehicles, including passenger cars; commercial vehicles, such as MCV's, HCV's, trucks, trailers; self-propelled vehicles; buses; and other assets. The company was formerly known as Public Joint Stock Company "SAFMAR Financial investments". Public Joint Stock Company SFI was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.
